name: Espresso
details: A strong, black coffee made by forcing steam through ground coffee beans.

name: Latte
details: A creamy coffee made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk.

name: Cappuccino
details: A coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and frothed milk.

name: Americano
details: A coffee drink made by diluting an espresso with hot water.

name: Mocha
details: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.

name: Macchiato
details: An espresso with a small amount of steamed milk, usually foamed.

name: Flat White
details: A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam (steamed milk with small, fine bubbles).

name: Affogato
details: An espresso-based dessert, where a shot of hot espresso is poured over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Iced Coffee
details: A cold coffee drink made with brewed coffee and ice cubes, often served with milk or cream.

name: Cold Brew
details: Coffee brewed with cold water over a long period, resulting in a smooth, rich flavor.
